product_name: Keen Newport H2 Sandals - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The all-terrain toddler girls' Keen Newport H2 Sandals are made with quick-drying polyester webbing and durable outsoles to provide comfortable, breathable protection for adventurous little feet. Polyester webbing uppers are lined with water-resistant rubber for fast-drying comfort and durability to keep up with young adventurers. Uppers are laced with elastic cord and secure with Quicklocks; 3M(R) reflective pull loops allow easy on/off. Patented toe guards protect little toes while hiking, walking, running and even biking. EVA midsoles provide cushioning and support; antimicrobial footbeds help keep foot odor under control. Nonmarking rubber outsoles offer exceptional durability and traction on wet surfaces.
short_description: The all-terrain toddler girls' Keen Newport H2 Sandals are made with quick-drying polyester webbing and durable outsoles to provide comfortable, breathable protection for adventurous little feet.
